label: Customer Support Ticketing
description: Whenever a Hubspot ticket is created: analyse its contents and rewrite it in clear, concise, and organized format. Then determine if it's a tech or customer support ticket and send it to Notion. If it's customer support then send a notification message with the rewritten to #sales-team, and if it's tech send it to #tech-team.

tasks.label: Get the ticket from the trigger
tasks.name: hubspot_1

tasks.label: Rewrite Ticket Content
tasks.name: openAi_1

messages.content:
Analyze the following customer support ticket and rewrite it in clear, concise, and organized format.

Ensure the rewritten version includes:

Customer Issue:
Clearly state the problem or question raised by the customer.

Background Information: 
Summarize any context or details provided by the customer.

Requested Action: Highlight what the customer wants or needs from support.


Tone: Use a professional and empathetic tone while simplifying the original text.

Original ticket: ${hubspot_1.body.properties.content}, ${hubspot_1.body.properties.subject}

Ticket priority: ${hubspot_1.body.properties.hs_ticket_priority}

tasks.description: Use OpenAI to rewrite the ticket for clarity.

tasks.label: Categorize Ticket
tasks.name: openAi_2

messages.content:
Read the following customer support ticket and categorize it into one of the following categories: tech or customer support. 

Ticket: ${hubspot_1.body.properties.subject}, ${hubspot_1.body.properties.content}

tasks.description: Use OpenAI to categorize the ticket as either tech or customer support.
Directs a stream based on true/false results of comparisons.
tasks.label: Notify appropriate team
tasks.name: condition_1

parameters.text:
Hey #sales-team,

A new customer support ticket has been assigned to your team. Please review the details below and assist the customer as soon as possible.

Rewritten Ticket Details:
${openAi_1}

Hey #tech-team

A new technical support ticket has been assigned to your team. Please review the details below and address the issue promptly.

Rewritten Ticket Details:
${openAi_1}
